context: does it function on a mac?
response: In best of my knowledge, No.

context: Is this a NEW game? Is it sealed?
response: The one I got was sealed and perfectly new

context: I received it but the package said it came from Japan. Can I still play it on my American PS3?
response: Yes you can playstation 3 is not region locked I got mine and other games from japan they worked fine

context: How do you get this to work with Windows 8.1 since there is no GFWL (since this was require to save progress)  service now?
response: Don't waste your time with the PC version wait for GTA 5 or get it on console. It is "fixable" but not worth the time when GTA 5 comes out for pc this month.

context: Can you hear your voice through the headset when you speak?
response: No you can not hear your voice through the headset.Unless you set that option up.

context: Will this work with the rechargeable energizer battery pak?
response: no it dont charge things just makes them turn on when the cord is hooked up

context: it works with windows 8.1 usb 3 and prepar3d? it have rudder movements?
response: Since USB3 works with older USB2 equipment, I'd say yes. Never heard of prepar3d, can't say to that. Rudder movement is through twisting the grip, although a set of rudder pedals 'feels' more correct.

context: Can the left wheel trim be used as a throttle?
response: The left wheel IS a throttle.

context: Since my Xbox One (with Kinect) is synced with my TV, can I also listen to TV shows & movies with these wirelessly?  THANKS!
response: If your TV or cable/satellite box has a digital optical (S/PDIF) audio output, then you can connect the XP400 transmitter's optical cable to that (instead of the game console itself) to listen to television shows and movies in the headset.

context: can you hear game audio on this headset when not playing online?
response: you can but it is very low audio. i recommend anything other than this headset such as astro, etc.

context: Is this a 05g model or below for CFW?
response: 05g? As far as i know,  psp doesn't get updates anymore and all can have cfw (i have proC update cfw installed)

context: it is Digital Game or Blu Ray?
response: Digital but PlayStation automatically plays blu ray

context: this game is a STEAM game or its a normal game?
response: this is a steam game-I tried to load game on steam and it was going to take about 14 hrs- returned game for credit- it is most likely a good game but 14 hrs not good

context: Can you use old Nintendo cartridges for this product or do you have to purchase new games? Thank you
response: You can use old games - regular DS, 2DS and 3DS games work on it.

context: How loud of sound do the keys on the keyboard make when typing? Does it give off a loud "click clacky" sound when typing?
response: It's not like a mechanical keyboard, but it does make a "click clacky" sound. It's a nice sound in my opinion, it wasn't that bad.

context: What is the difference between Saitek Pro Flight Rudder Pedals and Saitek Pro Cessna Rudder Pedals?
response: The cessna ones act practicaly the same as the cessna c series pedals in the way they feel, in performance is just a matter of calibration , manual and by software!

context: Can it fit 6 games along with a thicker stylus? I have an older version of this case that only holds 3 games that fits towards the front
How do you get this to work with Windows 8.1 since there is no GFWL (since this was require to save progress)  service now?
response: U can use the rock star social club to save progress or u can just save it to your hard drive without the gfwl by using steam.
